PHYLOBAYES_XSEDE_RESTART
infile_ - Primary Input File
ALL_FILES_ - Results -
runtime_ - Float - Maximum Hours to Run (click here for help setting this correctly)
chainfile1_ - InFile - Select the first chain file to restart
chainfile2_ - InFile - Select the second chain file to restart
chainparamfile1_ - InFile - Select the first chain.param file to restart
chainparamfile2_ - InFile - Select the second chain.param file
chaintreefile1_ - InFile - Select the first chain.treelist file to restart
chaintreefile2_ - InFile - Select the second chain.treelist file
chaintracefile1_ - InFile - Select the first chain.trace file to restart
chaintracefile2_ - InFile - Select the second chain.trace file
chainmonfile1_ - InFile - Select the first chain.monitor file to restart
chainmonfile2_ - InFile - Select the second chain.monitor file
